fa-card/actions.description: The action list, shows at the bottom of the Card.

fa-card/headStyle.description: Inline style to apply to the card head

fa-card/bodyStyle.description: Inline style to apply to the card content

fa-card/bordered.description: Toggles rendering of the border around the card

fa-card/defaultActiveTabKey.description: Initial active TabPane's key, if activeTabKey is not set.

fa-card/extra.description: Content to render in the top-right corner of the card

fa-card/loading.description: Shows a loading indicator while the contents of the card are being fetched

fa-card/tabList.description: List of TabPane's head, Custom tabs can be created with the scopedSlots property

fa-card/type.description: Card style type, can be set to inner or not set
